alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lowndes and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pintlala, or 8 miles east of Hayneville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Hayneville, Hunter, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Woodcrest, Dannelly Field, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Pinedale, Pintlala, Alabama State Capitol and Barachias. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
